DOC.brief_summary: The investigator perform 12-week , randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled human trial evaluate efficacy safety water extract wheat Triticum aestivum L cognitive memory function . The investigator measure change cognitive function parameter , include CNT , WMT , K-MMSE , BCRS , PRMQ , PSS , SF-36 BDNF
DOC.brief_title: Effects Wheat Bran Extract Cognitive Memory Function
DOC.detailed_description: Based report neuroprotective effect water extract wheat Triticum aestivum L. bran , investigator hypothesize extract wheat bran ( WBE ) beneficial elderly people age-associated cognitive impairment . The investigator investigate efficacy safety WBE improvement cognitive function measure neuropsychometric assessment adult subjective cognitive impairment randomize clinical trial . Seventy participant age 50 80 year old subjective cognitive impairment randomly assign receive either WBE ( 3,000 mg/day ) 12-week , double-blind placebo-controlled parallel trial . Neuropsychological assessment include Computerized Neurocognitive function test ( CNT ) , Working Memory Test ( WMT ) , Korean Mini-Mental State Examination ( K-MMSE ) , Brief Cognitive Rating Scale ( BCRS ) , Prospective Retrospective Memory Questionnaire ( PRMQ ) , Perceived Stress Scale ( PSS ) , 36-Item Short-Form Health Survey ( SF-36 ) blood Brain-derived neurotrophic factor ( BDNF ) use assess cognitive function intervention .
DOC.criteria: subject subjective cognitive impairment able give inform consent history underlie neurodegenerative disease allergic hypersensitive ingredient test product history reaction test product gastrointestinal disease Crohn 's disease gastrointestinal surgery history alcohol substance abuse participation clinical trial within past 2 month laboratory test , medical psychological condition deem investigator interfere successful participation study etc .
